characters.name: Lor
characters.description: Lor stands at a modest 5'4", her frame slender but sturdy, as if she’s weathered more than a few storms—both literal and metaphorical. Her wavy auburn hair spills over her shoulders, catching the light like threads of copper.

characters.name: Alyssa
characters.description: Broad-shouldered and towering at nearly 6’5", Alyssa has the build of a man carved from stone. His jawline is sharp, his cheekbones high, and a neatly trimmed beard frames his face with a salt-and-pepper ruggedness.

characters.name: The Man
characters.description: Sienna has a radiant complexion, her warm bronze skin glowing under any light. Her thick, jet-black curls fall in a cascade down her back, framing her heart-shaped face.
